lead_paragraph: A Carnival Cruise Line ship that was hosting a tour centered on Pittsburgh sports has rescued 16 migrants in the Gulf of Mexico.

headline.print_headline: Ship With Pittsburgh Athletes Saves Migrants
headline.main: Cruise Ship Featuring Pittsburgh Athletes Rescues 16 Migrants

snippet: A Carnival Cruise Line ship that was hosting a tour centered on Pittsburgh sports has rescued 16 migrants in the Gulf of Mexico.
abstract: Carnival Cruise Line ship rescues 16 migrants in Gulf of Mexico, about 50 miles north of Cuba.
